name: Vinamilk (Vietnam Dairy Products Joint Stock Company)
description: Vinamilk, officially known as Vietnam Dairy Products Joint Stock Company, is the largest dairy producer in Vietnam and a prominent player in the Asian dairy market. Founded in 1976, Vinamilk has grown from a modest state-owned enterprise into a publicly traded company listed on the Ho Chi Minh Stock Exchange. The company is dedicated to providing high-quality dairy products, including milk, yogurt, cheese, and ice cream, all while adhering to international quality standards. With a focus on sustainability and innovation, Vinamilk employs advanced technology in both its production processes and supply chain management. The company has made significant investments in expanding its dairy farms and production facilities, positioning itself as a leader in the dairy industry in Southeast Asia. Vinamilk is not only committed to improving the nutrition of Vietnamese consumers but also aims to enhance the livelihoods of local farmers by sourcing high-quality milk from them. The company has received numerous awards for its products and corporate social responsibility initiatives, reflecting its commitment to community welfare and environmental sustainability. With a vision to become one of the top 100 dairy companies in the world, Vinamilk continues to innovate and expand its product lines to meet the growing demands of consumers both domestically and internationally.

seo.meta_title: Vinamilk | Leading Dairy Producer in Vietnam
seo.meta_description: Explore Vinamilk, the largest dairy producer in Vietnam, committed to high-quality dairy products and sustainable practices. Learn more about our offerings and vision.

faq.question: What is Vinamilk known for?
faq.answer: Vinamilk is known for being the largest dairy producer in Vietnam, offering a wide range of dairy products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Vinamilk?
faq.answer: Mai Kieu Lien is the CEO of Vinamilk.

faq.question: Where is Vinamilk headquartered?
faq.answer: Vinamilk is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

faq.question: What are Vinamilk's main products?
faq.answer: Vinamilk's main products include milk, yogurt, cheese, and ice cream, as well as nutrition products.
